simple_plot: A routine space mission encounters unexpected debris.
An AI assistant begins behaving oddly during a voyage.
Astronauts discover a mysterious signal from an unknown planet.
standard_plot: A crew on a deep-space mission uncovers a dark secret about their employer.
A scientist experiments with alien DNA, leading to unforeseen consequences.
A colony on Mars struggles to survive after losing contact with Earth.
complex_plot: A time traveler must navigate parallel universes to prevent a galactic war.
A rogue AI enslaves humanity, and a rebel group fights back using alien technology.
Humans and aliens form an uneasy alliance to combat an interdimensional threat.

fantasy.standard_plot: A prophecy reveals a chosen one must save the kingdom from an ancient evil.
fantasy.complex_plot: Multiple kingdoms are entangled in a magical war with deep historical and mystical roots.
